thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 26 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Tongkun Group Starts Production Technology Upgrade Project, Fibre Production Project

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Tongkun Group Starts Production Technology Upgrade Project, Fibre Production Project

organizations.name: brief-tongkun group starts production technology upgrade project

text:
Feb 26 (Reuters) - Tongkun Group Co Ltd:
* SAYS IT STARTS PRODUCTION TECHNOLOGY UPGRADE PROJECT WITH INVESTMENT OF 958 MILLION YUAN ($151.89 million)
* SAYS IT STARTS FIBRE PRODUCTION PROJECT WITH INVESTMENT OF 970 MILLION YUAN Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2oqXG8u ; bit.ly/2GKlLxL Further company coverage: ($1 = 6.3071 Chinese yuan renminbi) (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
